snippet.title: Temple of the Lizard Men 4 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for my current project, Temple of the Lizard Men 4. If you are a fan of my project series, I think you will like what TOTLM4 has to offer. Choose from six player classes, each with their own story line, and venture off to take on the final onslaught of the Shadow Realm. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the scenery :)

TOTLM4 is Released! Here is the link to the final version:
**VERSION 2.0** - https://www.dropbox.com/s/hebdnaddnpvabuu/lmtmpl4_V2-0.zip?dl=0
https://www.doomworld.com/idgames/levels/doom2/Ports/megawads/lmtmple4

MUSIC PATCH UPDATE for those who want to do Let's Play videos:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/l8e8vfjtxjylen7/TOTLM4_Music_Patch.zip?dl=0


***Want to support me? Purchase my book series on amazon.com!***

***Book Series Link***
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P9NBLXJ/ref=sr_1_2?dchild=1&keywords=Alan+Duin&qid=1606688206&sr=8-2

***Adventures of the PPA: Invasion*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08P3H15KQ

***Adventures of the PPA: Venomous Vengeance*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1795526491

***Adventures of the PPA: Project Resurrection*** - EBOOK AVAILABLE!
https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0875YZFD5


Music Credit: 
The Monkey King by Krale 
[ Awesome song!  :)  ]

Namco - Pandora Theme from SF x Tekken
